        Install Notes (Please follow these instructions IN ORDER)

     1. Unpack the release with WinRAR or equivalent
 
     2. Run hlsinstall.exe and HL1 Source will automatically install.

     3. Run the game using the shortcut on your desktop and enjoy the
        original epic, Half-Life 1.
